degree.name: B. Tech
degree.stream: Computer Science and Engineering - Artificial Intelligence (CAI)

institution.name: KKR & KSR Institute of Technology & Sciences (KITS)

metadata.title: Conversational Image Recognition Chatbot
metadata.description: A chatbot that detects objects in images and generates contextually relevant responses. Designed to function both online and offline for accessibility in resource-constrained environments.

data_preprocessing.details: Video frames extracted and resized for training

integration.current_task: Chatbot interface and object detection features being developed

messages: Hey there! How can I assist you today?
Hello! Hope you're having an amazing day!
Hi! What's on your mind?
Hey! Ready to explore some knowledge?
Greetings, human! How may I be of service?
Welcome! Let's make today productive!
Hello! Always here to help!
Why don't robots get tired? Because they recharge their batteries!
I told my computer a joke… now it won't stop giggling in binary!
Why was the AI so good at chess? It had all the right moves!
Parallel lines have so much in common. It's a shame they'll never meet!
What did the chatbot say to the website? 'You complete me!'
I tried to make a belt out of watches… It was a waist of time!
Why did the math book look sad? It had too many problems!
Take care! Have a fantastic day ahead!
Goodbye! Hope to chat with you soon!
See you later! Stay awesome!
It was great talking to you! Stay curious!
Until next time! Keep exploring new ideas!
Logging out… but I'll be right here when you need me!
Bye for now! Keep learning and growing!
I'm sorry, but I don't have an answer for that right now.
Hmm… That's a tricky one! Let me get back to you on that.
Oops! I'm still learning and don't have that info yet.
I wish I knew the answer! Maybe you can help me learn?
That's beyond my knowledge for now, but I'll improve with time!
I couldn't find a relevant answer. Would you like to ask differently?
I'm unable to provide that information, but I can try to assist in another way!

prompts.noImage: Could you please provide an image to analyze?
prompts.feedback: How was my analysis? Would you like to rate it?

responses: Hello! I'm your image recognition assistant. How can I help you today?
Hi there! I can help you identify objects in images. What would you like to know?
Hey! Ready to analyze some images with you. What can I do for you?
Goodbye! Feel free to come back if you need more help!
See you later! Don't hesitate to ask if you need assistance again.
You're welcome! Have a great day!

I can help you identify objects in images! You can either upload an image or use your webcam to capture one. I'll analyze the image and tell you what objects I see. You can also ask me specific questions about the objects in the image.

My main features include:
- Object detection in images
- Webcam image capture
- Image upload support
- Detailed object descriptions
- Answering questions about detected objects

I use advanced AI models to analyze images. When you provide an image, I:
1. Process the image data
2. Identify objects and their characteristics
3. Generate detailed descriptions
4. Answer your specific questions about the content

While I'm quite capable, I have some limitations:
- I work best with clear, well-lit images
- I may not recognize very small or obscure objects
- I can't process video or animated content
- I can't edit or modify images

I'm sorry you're experiencing issues. Let's try these steps:
1. Make sure your image is clear and well-lit
2. Try uploading the image again
3. If using webcam, ensure it's properly connected
4. Check your internet connection

If the problem persists, please try:
- Refreshing the page
- Using a different image
- Checking your browser permissions

For technical support or to report issues:
- Email: support@example.com
- Hours: Monday-Friday, 9AM-5PM EST
- Response time: Within 24 hours

fallback_responses: I'm not sure I understand. Could you please rephrase that?
I don't have enough information to answer that. Could you provide more details?
I'm not trained to handle that specific request. Is there something else I can help you with?
